ygData.subject: Re: BIND SIGHT
ygData.msgSnippet: So this could be useful to cast on a TANK friend of yours? How do you use it effectively? ... From: John Penman To: eq_wizards@onelist.com Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
So this could be useful to cast on a TANK friend of yours?
How do you use it effectively?

----- Original Message -----
From: John Penman
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 12:05 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: BIND SIGHT


You see through the targets eyes and see now it is doing during fights as if you were the mob.

Shadair

----- Original Message -----
From: Mata
To: EQ WIZARDS
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 10:48 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] BIND SIGHT




What does BIND Sight do????

See through target & fatigue loss????

Bind Sight See through target & Fatigue Loss
